feed.title: I do not support the BIP 148 UASF

entry.title: I do not support the BIP 148 UASF
entry.summary: In a Bitcoin-dev mailing list, Karl Johan Alm expressed concern over making harmful options easy to enable for users and emphasized the importance of protecting users of the base Bitcoin Core implementation. He argued that NOT enforcing BIP148 puts users at more risk. There is a division of opinion among developers and therefore, there should be an option available to let users decide one way or the other. Luke was the sender of this email.
